named-query.name: Vehicle.findByPlate
named-query.query: select v from Vehicle v where v.plateNumber = ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByIds
named-query.query: select a from WorkOrder a where a.id in ?1

named-query.name: PaymentMean.findByInvoiceId
named-query.query: select m from Invoice f join f.workOrders w join w.vehicle.client c join c.paymentMeans m where f.id = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findByDni
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m where m.dni = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findInForceInContractType
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m join m.contractInForce c join c.contractType ct where ct.name = ?1 and c.state = ?2

named-query.name: Mechanic.findMechanicInProfessionalGroup
named-query.query: select c.mechanic from Contract c where c.professionalGroup = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findByAllContractsInForce
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m join m.contractInForce c where c.state=?1

named-query.name: Payroll.findCurrentMonthPayrolls
named-query.query: select p from Payroll p where p.date <= ?1 and p.date>=?2

named-query.name: Invoice.findByNumber
named-query.query: select f from Invoice f where f.number = ?1

named-query.name: Invoice.getNextInvoiceNumber
named-query.query: select max(f.number) + 1 from Invoice f

named-query.name: ContractType.findByName
named-query.query: select c from ContractType c where c.name = ?1

named-query.name: ContractType.findById
named-query.query: select c from ContractType c where c.id = ?1

named-query.name: ContractType.findAll
named-query.query: select c from ContractType c

named-query.name: Contract.findAllInForce
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.state = "IN_FORCE"

named-query.name: Contract.findById
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.id = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findByFiredMechanicId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c join c.firedMechanic m where m.id = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findByMechanicId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c join c.firedMechanic m where m.id = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findByProfessionalGroupId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.professionalGroup = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findByContractTypeId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.contractType = ?1

named-query.name: ProfessionalGroup.findByName
named-query.query: select p from ProfessionalGroup p where p.name = ?1
